purpleculture_pinyin:
chēng
to support; to prop up; to push or move with a pole; to maintain; to open or unfurl; to fill to bursting point; brace; stay; support
поддерживать; подпирать; толкать или двигаться с шестом; поддерживать; открыть или развернуть; заполнить до точки разрыва; скоба; оставаться; поддерживать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 撑)
Pictophonetic: 牚 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
撐腰 [ chēng yāo ]: to support; to brace
撐桿跳高 [ chēng gān tiào gāo ]: pole-vaulting
撐竿跳高 [ chēng gān tiào gāo ]: pole vault; also written 撑杆跳高
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 牚 [ chēng ]
heisig_chinese_memo: You are brushing your teeth in the outhouse when you notice a shelf about to fall, so you prop up the shelf with your fingers until you are done brushing.
Ru_trainchinese: chēng: (глаг) поддерживать; раскрывать; выдерживать; наполнять до отказа
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To prop up your child so she can reach the cookies just position the palm of the hand under her armpits, grip with your fingers, and lift.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand " to the sound of " applause ", it means resistance and support. Han Sima Xiangru's "Nagamen Fu": "Luo Fengrong travels with trees, and supports each other away from the building." Li Shan quoted "Zi Lin": "Support, pillar."

" Supporting " often means using a ball to go boat. Tang Bai Juyi's "Twenty-Four Rhymes of Remuneration to the Niu Xianggong in Huainan": "Penny sticks supporting the fishing boat, and the golden armor holds the boat."

" Support " can mean full. Song Wang Anshi (Ancient Yi): "At that time, the peach pit was abandoned, and it was said that it had been in the moon cave."

" Support " can also mean open. The second fold of Yuan Qin Jianfu's "Dong Tang Lao": "Don't be trivial, you old man, you just keep your eyes open to see how my clothes are."

" Support " can also mean beauty in modern Chinese. Jin Dong Jieyuan's "The Tune of the Western Chamber" Volume 1: "His face is full of charm, and I can go out and walk slowly, even in the Moon Palace, even Heng'e does not support it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the sound of " applause ", it means resisting and supporting.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「掌」聲，表示抵住、支持。漢司馬相如〈長門賦〉：「羅丰茸之遊樹兮，離樓梧而相撐。」李善注引《字林》：「撐，柱也。」

　　「撐」常表示用篙行船。唐白居易〈奉酬淮南牛相公思黯見寄二十四韻〉：「竹篙撐釣艇，金甲擁樓船。」

　　「撐」可表示裝滿。宋王安石〈古意〉：「當時棄桃核，聞已撐月窟。」

　　「撐」也可表示張開。元秦簡夫《東堂老》第二摺：「你這老頭兒不要瑣碎，你只是把眼兒撐着，看我這架子衣服如何。」

　　「撐」在近代漢語中還可表示美麗。金董解元《西廂記諸宮調》卷一：「臉兒稔色百媚生，出得門兒來慢慢地行，便是月殿裏姮娥也沒恁地撐。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「掌」聲，表示抵住、支持。

從「 手 」，「 掌 」聲，表示抵住、支持。漢司馬相如〈長門賦〉：「羅丰茸之遊樹兮，離樓梧而相撐。」李善注引《字林》：「撐，柱也。」 「 撐 」常表示用篙行船。唐白居易〈奉酬淮南牛相公思黯見寄二十四韻〉：「竹篙撐釣艇，金甲擁樓船。」 「 撐 」可表示裝滿。宋王安石〈古意〉：「當時棄桃核，聞已撐月窟。」 「 撐 」也可表示張開。元秦簡夫《東堂老》第二摺：「你這老頭兒不要瑣碎，你只是把眼兒撐着，看我這架子衣服如何。」 「 撐 」在近代漢語中還可表示美麗。金董解元《西廂記諸宮調》卷一：「臉兒稔色百媚生，出得門兒來慢慢地行，便是月殿裏姮娥也沒恁地撐。」
From the " hand" to the sound of " applause", it means resistance and support. Han Sima Xiangru's "Nagamen Fu": "Luo Fengrong travels with trees, and supports each other away from the building." Li Shan quoted "Zi Lin": "Support, pillar." " Supporting" often means using a ball to go boat. Tang Bai Juyi's "Twenty-Four Rhymes of Remuneration to the Niu Xianggong in Huainan": "Penny sticks supporting the fishing boat, and the golden armor holds the boat." " Support" can mean full. Song Wang Anshi (Ancient Yi): "At that time, the peach pit was abandoned, and it was said that it had been in the moon cave." " Support" can also mean open. The second fold of Yuan Qin Jianfu's "Dong Tang Lao": "Don't be trivial, you old man, you just keep your eyes open to see how my clothes are." " Support" can also mean beauty in modern Chinese. Jin Dong Jieyuan's "The Tune of the Western Chamber" Volume 1: "His face is full of charm, and I can go out and walk slowly, even in the Moon Palace, even Heng'e does not support it."

撐字的基本解释

撐
chēng
同“撑”。

撐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chēng］
“牚2”的被通假字。同“撑1”。

撐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撐； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页454第03
【唐韻】丑庚切【集韻】抽庚切，?音瞠。與樘同。【說文】樘衺柱也。【廣韻】撥也。【唐書·朱滔傳】骸撐不掩。【韓愈·月蝕詩】赤龍黑烏燒口熱，翎鬣倒側相搪撐。　又【集韻】中庚切。義同。　又叶抽良切，音倀。【司馬相如·長門賦】刻木蘭以爲榱兮，飾文杏以爲梁。羅丰茸之遊樹兮，離樓梧而相撐。【通雅】䟫卽䠆。一作牚。今作撐。俗呼雌爭反。【正字通】橕撐牚䟫，音義?同。
